Blog

Here are some random snippets or thoughts from Bobby's brain. This could be about anything from his hatred of mushrooms (it's deeply seeded in his heart) to aviation (he loves that) to a weird computer science thingy he just learned. All views expressed in blog are mine (unless it's an external site)...and sarcasm will not be denoted...so read between the lines!
